abstract: Steven Kurutz My Space column features Midtown Manhattan apartment of interior designer Ryan Korban; designer explains why beige living room, with unique curios and fireplace, is his favorite spot.
lead_paragraph: The interior designer Ryan Korban, whose clients include Alexander Wang and James Franco, scales back on taxidermy and loads up on luxury in beige.

headline.main: A Downtown Decorator in His Own Space

snippet: The interior designer Ryan Korban, whose clients include Alexander Wang and James Franco, scales back on taxidermy and loads up on luxury in beige.
